short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Showing creators collaboration to build connection across cultures.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How do we increase compassion between diverse and disconnected creator communities during this isolating time era in history? 

To answer this question, Adobe Design paired up creators from different cultures and artistic mediums together. Each pair of creators developed their own unique work to reduce isolation and inspire compassion around the world. 

Each time you open a new tab in Chrome youâ€™ll see a new creation. If a work triggers your curiosity, explore it and and scroll down to learn more about each collaboration and creator.
